filterType.description: FilterType specifies the category of filter (e.g., "date", "number").

from.description: From specifies the starting value for the filter range.

to.description: To specifies the ending value for the filter range.

type.description: Type specifies the type of filter (e.g., "range").

hasNextPage.description: HasNextPage indicates whether there is a next page.

hasPerviousPage.description: HasPerviousPage indicates whether there is a previous page.

items.description: Items contains the list of items for the current page.

pageNumber.description: PageNumber is the current page number.

totalPages.description: TotalPages is the total number of pages available.

totalRows.description: TotalRows is the total number of rows available.

filter.description: Filter contains a map of column IDs to their filter configurations.

pageNumber.description: PageNumber specifies the current page number.

pageSize.description: PageSize specifies the number of items per page.

sort.description: Sort contains a list of sorting options.

col_id.description: ColId specifies the column to sort.

sort.description: Sort specifies the sorting direction (e.g., "asc" or "desc").
